text: @BernieSanders @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @grandson ACTION NEEDED-call your legislative reps & demand #VoteByMail FOR EVERY CITIZEN so we don’t have to choose between our health and our vote!!  #GOTV #VoterSupression #coronavirus #Social_Distancing #flatteningthecurve #Primary2020 #Bernie2020 #BernieForPresident #COVID19 #HVNYL

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
